issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: HADOOP-1540 added the ability to exclude files for copy by comparing each file to a set of Java regex patterns.  If the file matches a given patch it will be excluded from the copy listing.  However, this patch failed to update the debug logging to report when files are excluded from the copy listing.
fields.summary: DistCp DEBUG logs report -filters files as if they were going to be copied

comments.body: [~jingzhao] I've added this patch as a fix to HADOOP-1540.  It's a very minor change, so I've not included any tests.  If you feel a test is appropriate for this change I will be happy to add it.

\\
